titleStmt.title: The subjects satisfaction being a new song of the proclaiming King William and Queen Mary the 13th. of this instant February, to the great joy and comfort of the whole kingdom : to the tune of, Grim King of the ghosts; or, Hail to the mirtle shades.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Deacon, at the Angel in Guilt-spur-street,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "King William is come to the throne ..."
Printed on verso of both copies: Loves lamentable tragedy (Wing L3270).
Both items imperfect: stained, with print show through.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
